topics.body:
Laid back lifeguard becomes alert.
Reaches for some binoculars
Look to make sure that she's hot...
in a second, probably not.
Jump, jazz hands. Hit the sand.
Save your future girlfriend!
Cameraman is right beside her.
He could save her, doesn't bother.
Cause his job's getting all these
awesome shots of this
lifeguard who occasionally
beat sharks with his fists.
KO.
Sink him to the bottom.
Go and save the supermodel.
Return for some mouth to mouth.
Look right, lay down.
Cue romantic slow motion rotation.
Sweet embrace, hold her gaze for days,
then touch her face.
Then something happens off frame...
Straight up out of outer space.
Hero of the Human Race.
Doesn't matter what you fought.
Nothing beats an astronaut!
Slow motion hot, ever!
Axe Apollo Space Academy.
